subject: Re: [junit] Print to file
msgSnippet: Additionally to the methods suggested by others you might consider to implement junit.framework.TestListener which can then be registered with the TestResult
messageBody:
Additionally to the methods suggested by others you might consider to
implement junit.framework.TestListener which can then be registered with
the TestResult object. Probably someone has already done exactly that...

Johannes

marciofreitas@... wrote:
